::Axis/Lokk::

	"NO, NO, NO, definately NOT!" he shudders at the thought of 
Seekker driving. Axis contains himself, for now.

On 23 Apr 2001, at 5:15, gunthers8@... wrote:

> ::Seekker::
> Seekker turns his body in the seat and grabs the seat belt. Trying ot 
> clip it in while the ship begins to shake. 
> "Woheeehhhaaahhehhehe" he yells out waving his hand in the air.
> "haha...he lokk let me drive..."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
>  ::Axis/Lokk::
> > 
> > 	Lokk smacks his head, "Should have known... bah!" then he 
> > shouts out over the increasing noise, "Entering atmosphere now. 
> > This time, Seekker, put you seat belt on." He grips the steering 
> > controls, and begins the almost impossible task of steering a 
> > careening space vehicle throught the atmosphere. Axis moans 
> > from behind, "I don't feels so well..." Lokk smacks his head again.
> >
